attributes.action: Change the law to make zero tolerance for the use of alcohol by drivers in the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of the countries in Europe have a zero tolerance policy, how come we are STILL allowing people to get into their cars and drive? How many deaths and serious injuries do we need to hear of before the government adopt this policy ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
